The seq/fold_right.hpp header defines macros for folding (or accumulating) a seq right-to-left.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/seq/fold_right.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOLD_RIGHT
  • BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOLD_RIGHT_s
